feed.title: Leantime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.8
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.7 to @

Commits

  • e610cf769 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.8
  • 8fdb0958f task: add waits to tests
  • 352415603 fix: improved return message for file upload issues
  • 4e358b809 fix: improved verification for time entries
  • f6200a185 fix: multiple init of buttons on dashboard #2999
  • df193663e fix: simple ical verification
  • 502589297 task: update tests
  • 570accb6b fix: User deactivation was not working correctly
  • 6c0983e9c fix: Ensure correct date is parsed in due date parser when duplicating projects
  • f52e05b7a task: add additional support menu
  • 66b1abfc5 feat: Improved onboarding flow and helper content
  • 43854fbef task: plugin installation and management improvements
  • 1b5100e3e Update sample.env
  • 8c442003c feat: simplify card design and remove gradient
  • a19fc54a9 task: additional logging on install repo
  • d0514059b fix: Ensure sessions folder exists before putting files into it
  • e58012b8a [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.7
  • 108613205 Update README.md
  • dba568859 task: bump version
  • 60f714461 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.7

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (145 commits)

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.9
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.8 to @

Commits

  • e07bc667e [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.9
  • 8a6dddfd0 task: add timeout to test to ensure request finishes before checking db
  • 754984992 task: update readme
  • c52b930b5 task: update screenshot
  • 4b3f74bf7 task: update readme screenshot
  • 2e805fa67 task: version bump
  • a02e0683b task: clean up code style
  • e48608f1f fix: user settings not stored/retrieved correctly
  • 1d203ebc8 fix: cmd installation failed #3003
  • a92a2de8d fix: notes form css
  • 12bba8bb3 task: fix code styles
  • 3375c412e feat: improved notes style handling
  • a5100f20d fix: idea file upload issue
  • 747ff31a2 fix: calendar drag and drop issue
  • e610cf769 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.8

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (13 commits)

Files

CHANGELOG.md | 118 ++++++++++++++++++++ README.md | 2 +- app/Command/MigrateCommand.php | 11 +- app/Core/Configuration/AppSettings.php | 2 +- app/Core/Support/DateTimeHelper.php | 11 ++ app/Domain/Auth/Services/Auth.php | 1 + app/Domain/Calendar/Js/calendarController.js | 22 ++-- app/Domain/Help/Services/Helper.php | 119 +++++++++++++++++++++ app/Domain/Help/register.php | 118 +------------------- app/Domain/Ideas/Js/ideasController.js | 76 +------------ app/Domain/Ideas/Templates/showBoards.tpl.php | 2 +- .../Notifications/Services/Notifications.php | 4 + app/Domain/Tickets/Services/Tickets.php | 8 +- .../Widgets/Templates/partials/myToDos.blade.php | 9 +- app/Domain/Wiki/Templates/templates.tpl.php | 29 +++++ package-lock.json | 4 +- package.json | 2 +- public/assets/css/components/dropdowns.css | 1 - public/assets/css/components/forms.css | 53 +++++---- public/assets/css/components/style.default.css | 1 - public/assets/images/Screenshots/mywork-v3.4.png | Bin 0 -> 685404 bytes public/assets/images/Screenshots/mywork.png | Bin 994289 -> 0 bytes public/assets/js/app/core/editors.js | 8 +- public/dist/mix-manifest.json | 32 +++--- tests/Acceptance/TimesheetCest.php | 2 +- 25 files changed, 369 insertions(+), 266 deletions(-)

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.4.12
entry.content:
Changes in this Release

History from v3.4.11 to @

Highlights

Improvements * Added Add Task link to bottom of milestones on my todo dashboard * Wiki Articles are not sorted correctly thanks to @ObySamKenoby

Fixes * Fixed various marketplace installation and verification checks * Fixed date time issues in dutch and german where day short names were not defined correctly * Fixed design issues in firefox and chrome when using minimal theme + dark mode * Update nginx examples and update web.config for IIS hosted instances

Commits

  • 5277a21df [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.12
  • 3a30599db task: version bump
  • c2f0f5829 feat: Improve ticket sorting and add task link for individual milestones
  • 3d70b6d9a fix: nginx examples
  • 9cc4a9ab2 fix: web.config for iis fix
  • cf15c7893 task: fix code style
  • 3d77d81b1 fix: handling of shortnames and monthnames in different languages and aligning js with php
  • 2feb09711 fix: firefox design issue
  • b7189e63f task: fix code style and remove verbose logging
  • 2fcd51648 task: Improve htmx event management
  • 8a1a45ca9 Update articleDialog.tpl.php
  • 8d0e88d03 Update Wiki.php
  • 771214393 task: remove not needed file
  • 45638af9c fix: increase wait timeouts on tests
  • 11541acf5 task: further clean up
  • 7264c3b0b Update Plugins
  • 78bbc5f3e Update Plugins
  • b97684988 task: fix code styles
  • 497fab464 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.11
  • 41103071b fix: update mix handling
  • 1b65bdb71 [Changelog CI] Add Changelog for Version 3.4.10
  • 9ad5c8533 Update Plugins
  • 7b5a28007 task: base preparations for AI plugin
  • b842fa7d8 task: new code style rule to clean up namespace code style (remove curly brackets)

Contributors

  • Marcel Folaron (21 commits)
  • ObySamKenoby (2 commits)

Files
